subject: IWRS Alert: Low IP Stock Site 1205
body:
This is an automated notification.

Investigational Product stock for study DNL310 at Site 1205 (University Hospital of Munich) has fallen below the minimum re-supply threshold.

Product: DNL310
Kits on hand: 2
Minimum threshold: 3

Please review inventory and order a resupply shipment as needed.

subject: DNL310 Study: IP Stock at Site 1205
body:
Hi Liam,

I just saw the automated low stock notification from the IWRS. We currently only have two kits of DNL310 remaining.

We have two patients, 1205-003 and 1205-004, scheduled for their infusions next Tuesday and Wednesday. We will not have enough drug to cover both visits.

Could you please look into this for us?

Thank you,

Dr. Elena Vogel
Pharmacist
University Hospital of Munich

subject: Fwd: DNL310 Study: IP Stock at Site 1205
body:
Hi Sarah,

Please see the email below from the pharmacist at Site 1205. They have insufficient IP for two patient visits scheduled for next week.

Could you please arrange for an expedited shipment to the site to prevent a potential dosing delay?

Alex - FYI.

Best regards,

Liam Gallagher
Clinical Research Associate
Syneos Health

‐‐‐‐‐‐‐ Original Message ‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
From: Dr. Elena Vogel <elena.vogel@uhm.de>
Sent: Monday, November 6, 2023 9:32 AM
To: Liam Gallagher <liam.gallagher@syneos.com>
Cc: Martina Schmidt <martina.schmidt@uhm.de>
Subject: DNL310 Study: IP Stock at Site 1205

Hi Liam,

I just saw the automated low stock notification from the IWRS. We currently only have two kits of DNL310 remaining.

We have two patients, 1205-003 and 1205-004, scheduled for their infusions next Tuesday and Wednesday. We will not have enough drug to cover both visits.

Could you please look into this for us?

Thank you,

Dr. Elena Vogel
